For the selected provinces, annual yield anomalies (t/ha) of wheat and barley were obtained based on area (ha) and ton of production (t) from the Spanish Agriculture, Food and Environment Ministry (available at https://www.mapa.gob.es). Spatial averages were computed for each cluster and long-term trends were removed by linear detrending, in order to exclude non-climatic factors such as technological development
